attributes.action: Create a sanction for peers found guilty of corrution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would appear that nothing can be done to any of the peers even if they are found guilty of taking bribes to change legislation. We ask the prime minister to restore the faith of the public in politicians and peers by: Stripping peers or MPs found to have taken bribes of their titles or seats in parliament, and then using the existing proceeds of crime legislation to take away the cash they took as bribes just as would happen to a drug dealer.
